data.name: CreateDashboardStagingPriority35
ReadCaseAssignment
data.value: select REASON_CODE, EFFECTIVE_DATE, DISCONTINUE_DATE, CREATED_TIMESTAMP, SPD_ID, OFF_ID, OSP_CODE, OSP_DATE, CAS_NO from CKT_ASSIGN_CASE where @casNo = CAS_NO order by DISCONTINUE_DATE desc

data.name: ReadCseOrganization
data.value: select ORGANZTN_ID, TYPE_CODE from CKT_CSE_ORGANIZATN where TYPE_CODE = 'J' order by ORGANZTN_ID

data.name: ReadDashboardStagingPriority1
data.value: select REPORT_MONTH, REPORT_LEVEL, REPORT_LEVEL_ID, AS_OF_DATE, CAS_W_EST_REF, CAS_W_ENF_REF from CKT_DB_STAGE_PRI35 where REPORT_MONTH = @reportMonth and REPORT_LEVEL = 'JD'

data.name: ReadDashboardStagingPriority2
data.value: select REPORT_MONTH, REPORT_LEVEL, REPORT_LEVEL_ID, AS_OF_DATE, CAS_W_EST_REF, CAS_W_ENF_REF from CKT_DB_STAGE_PRI35 with(xlock) where REPORT_MONTH = @reportMonth and REPORT_LEVEL = @reportLevel and REPORT_LEVEL_ID = @reportLevelId

data.name: ReadLegalReferralCase
data.value: select T1.CAS_NUMBER, T1.IDENTIFIER, T1.STATUS_DATE, T1.STATUS, T1.REFERRAL_DATE, T1.CREATED_TIMESTAMP, T1.REFERRAL_REASON_1, T1.REFERRAL_REASON_2, T1.REFERRAL_REASON_3, T1.REFERRAL_REASON_4, T2.STATUS, T2.NO_JURISDICTION_CD from CKT_CASE T2 with(readuncommitted) join CKT_LEGAL_REFERRAL T1 with(readuncommitted) on T2.NUMB = T1.CAS_NUMBER and T2.NUMB >= @numb and T1.CREATED_TIMESTAMP <= @createdTimestamp and ( (T1.STATUS in ('O', 'S')) and T1.CREATED_TIMESTAMP <= @createdTimestamp or (T1.STATUS in ('C', 'W', 'R')) and T1.STATUS_DATE >= @statusDate and T1.CREATED_TIMESTAMP <= @createdTimestamp ) order by T1.CAS_NUMBER, T1.CREATED_TIMESTAMP desc

data.name: UpdateDashboardStagingPriority35
data.value: update CKT_DB_STAGE_PRI35 set AS_OF_DATE = @asOfDate, CAS_W_EST_REF = @casWEstRef, CAS_W_ENF_REF = @casWEnfRef where REPORT_MONTH = @reportMonth and REPORT_LEVEL = @reportLevel and REPORT_LEVEL_ID = @reportLevelId
